summary: 1990  was a common year starting on Monday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Carlos Desiderio Peucelle  was an Argentine football player who played inside right/wing and is considered one of Argentina's finest wingers in their history. He is also known for being the catalyst for starting "La Maquina" with River Plate who went on to dominate football in South America in the 1940s.
title: Carlos Peucelle
